me_no_target: You can't find a friend to chuckle with.
me_self: You chuckle at your own joke, since no one else would.
me_room: You give a polite little chuckle.
actor_self: $n chuckles at $s own joke, since none of you would.
actor_other: $n gives a polite little chuckle to $N's joke.
actor_me: $n gives a politle but unappreciative chuckle to your joke.
me_actor: You indicate your underappreciation of $S joke.
